meanings.definition: To cause someone to believe or feel certain about something.
meanings.sent1: She used facts to convince her friend that the Earth is round.
meanings.sent2: The teacher tried to convince the students that studying is important.
meanings.sent3: He tried to convince his cat to take a bath, but the cat was not convinced.
meanings.sent4: The colorful illustrations in the book convinced the child to read more.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt speech convinced everyone to support the cause.

meanings.definition: To persuade someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: The children convinced their parents to buy them ice cream.
meanings.sent2: I will try to convince my brother to go to the park with me.
meanings.sent3: The dog convinced the owner to play fetch by wagging its tail excitedly.
meanings.sent4: The delicious smell of the bakery convinced me to buy a fresh loaf of bread.
meanings.sent5: Her enthusiasm convinced her friends to join her in volunteering at the shelter.
